meta.description: Optimize the number of vans and trucks used to supply shoes to stores.

sets.name: VEHICLES
sets.description: Types of vehicles used for transportation

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each vehicle type in pairs of shoes

params.name: min_shoes
params.description: Minimum number of pairs of shoes to be supplied

vars.name: num_vehicles
vars.description: Number of each type of vehicle used

objective.name: min_total_vans
objective.description: Minimize the number of vans used

constraints.name: supply_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least the minimum number of pairs of shoes are supplied

constraints.name: truck_van_ratio
constraints.description: The number of trucks used cannot exceed the number of vans used
